20101221235824.000|20101221235825.000|CC1|        Are you trapped         
20101221235825.000|20101221235825.000|CC1|  and don't know how to escape  
20101221235825.000|20101221235830.000|CC1| your addiction to cigarettes?  
20101221235830.000|20101221235830.000|CC1| One out of two regular smokers 
20101221235830.000|20101221235830.000|CC1|   will die prematurely from    
20101221235830.000|20101221235835.000|CC1|           smoking.             
20101221235835.000|20101221235835.000|CC1|  You don't have to be one of   
20101221235835.000|20101221235838.000|CC1|             them.              
20101221235838.000|20101221235840.000|CC1|        Escape the trap.        
20101221235840.000|20101221235844.000|CC1|         Say "Enough."

20101221235844.000|20101221235844.000|CC1|  call the California Smokers'  
20101221235844.000|20101221235847.000|CC1|          Helpline at
